Package com.soprabanking.ips.controllers

Class ProposalController

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.ProposalController
@RestController
@CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping("/proposal")
public class ProposalController
extends java.lang.Object
Proposal Controller This is a controller class for proposals which will be seen on different feeds. The ProposalController Class implements an application which does the following
  • add Proposal
  • delete Proposal
  • update Proposal
  • share Proposal
Author:
mojha
See Also:
RestController, CrossOrigin, RequestMapping, Autowired, PostMapping

  • Method Details

    • addProposal

      @PostMapping(value="/add", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Proposal> addProposal​(@RequestBody java.lang.String body)
      This is a method used to Add proposal in a string which is sent in a Response Entity. ResponseEntity represents an HTTP response, including headers, body, and status
      Some variables used in this method are
      • proposalService : an Object of the ProposalService
      • saveProposal : a method in class ProposalService called by object proposalSService
      Parameters:
      body - of string type containing the proposal object
      Returns:
      Response Entity with the saved proposal with a OK Http Status
      See Also:
      ProposalService, Proposal

    • shareProposal

      @PostMapping(value="/share", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> shareProposal​(@RequestBody java.lang.String body)
      This is a method used to Share proposal in a string which is sent in a Response Entity. ResponseEntity represents an HTTP response, including headers, body, and status

      • proposalService : an Object of the ProposalService

      ProposalService
